description.english: Defeat death.

Answer all quiz questions correctly.
Find more than 10 silver coins.
Free the being from the wall.
Kill the creature in the wall.
Kill the runaway chicken.
Rescue the runaway chicken.

Keep providing the cemetery caretaker with new work.
Get kicked out of the casino.
Get the master amulet from the demon king.
Destroy the washing machine instead of repairing it.
Make sure the guard's date goes badly.
Burn all MPEGs to CD.
Guess the second word when you choose chatting with the NPC near Bot Bot.
Destroy the first three monster cages in the Interface
Open the first three monster cages in the Interface
Take the spider woman of the interface to the Iroquois.
Kill all delinquents in the torture room of the interface.
Destroy at least 10 bio-tubes in the interface.
Get the Perk Persuasion Level 2 without paying money.
Find the secret access to the room containing SuR's Bible.
Give a name to the monster in the third cage in the interface.
Win at least two bets in the whole game.
Play all mini games in the interface.
Witness the wizard of the game removing fire and water from the interface.
Defeat all enemies in the arena in the interface.
Have all cages in the interface cleaned.
Successfully roam the interface of the game.
Try to cause serious bugs using the blue portals.
On the pixel continent, give the buddy of Goku the name Son.
Find all special coins in No one lives in heaven.
Poison the pond on the pixel continent.
Complete both treasure hunts on the pixel continent successfully.
Get an embarrassing and unpleasant hangover due to the intake of simulated drinks.
Kick at least five pictures of the walls in the houses of the NPCs.
Find the fighter's grindstone based on the directions of his notes.
Take a passenger with you on the pixel continent's treasure hunt.
Activate the server in the castle of the pixel continent.
Destroy the scarecrow during the first treasure hunt on the pixel continent.
Defeat all monsters in the arena of the pixel continent.
Instead of defending the server from the pixel continent, just do nothing.
Fathom the concept of truth with the stick man on the pixel continent.
Find the secret diary of the crashed spaceship.
Take care of the player who has reached a dead end so that he can move on.
Play the Melody of Death on Sellis World and cause such a serious bug in the start menu that the game crashes.
Have an NPC of the game certify your intelligence.
Travel through time within No one lives in heaven.
Be in the game twice at the same time.
Take part in school lessons at Sellis World.
Do not return the chips to the disabled NPC, so that he does not fall into a logic loop.
Squeal on your own crime and get the bonus from the mayor.
Get a perk one chapter earlier than the game programmers originally intended.
Start a diversionary maneuver to free the Miji on Sellis world.
Start a rescue operation to free the Miji on Sellis world.
Screw up the captcha code several times so that the other player thinks that you are not a real person.
Send the woman holding the Miji captive south to the spaceship.

displayName.english: The lieutenant in the red uniform
